text: Tyler Zink (born January 30, 2001) is an American tennis player. Zink won the 2019 US Open – Boys' Doubles title with fellow American Eliot Spizzirri. Zink plays college tennis at the University of Georgia. Zink has won 2 ITF Futures Tour doubles tournaments.
